main_definition: Promotions refer to advancements in position or rank, as well as the act of promoting products or services to enhance their visibility or appeal.

meanings_and_examples.example: John received a promotion at work and was now managing his own team.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Discounts or special offers on products
meanings_and_examples.example: The store offered promotions where customers could buy one item and get the second item 50% off.
During Valentine's Day, the flower shop ran a promotion by offering free roses with any purchase over $100.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Special events or occasions for employees
meanings_and_examples.example: The company held an annual promotions event where they recognized and rewarded outstanding employee performance.
